channel.title: Hack the AI
channel.description: Recent content on Hack the AI

item.description: These notes will help you to learn and understand how Artificial Intelligence relates to other topics. -- Artificial Intelligence A high-level, umbrella term for when machines or tools have cognitive capabilities (memory, knowing, perceiving, reasoning) and exhibit forms of intelligence Machine Learning Statistical tools for learning from data Data Science Techniques for analysing, understanding and gaining insights from data Fundamental areas Probability Statistics Linear Algebra Numerical Optimisation Data Visualisation Computer Programming

These notes will help you to learn and understand Machine Learning. -- Machine Learning Definition here TODO Machine Learning Natural Language Processing (NLP) Language Translation Classification Question Answering Speech Text to Speech Computer Vision Robotics Deep Learning Deep Neural Networks Classic Machine Learning
